languages.text: "...ваши познания представляют определенный интерес для Инквизиции. Прежде чем ваша участь будет решена, я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}проведу необходимые процедуры{/d} для извлечения данных. Вы можете проявить содействие в предоставлении доступа к реминисцентным блокам, однако для распечатывания блоков с потерянным доступом нам потребуется... несколько больше усилий".

"...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."
languages.original_text: "...ваши познания представляют определенный интерес для Инквизиции. Прежде чем ваша участь будет решена, я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}проведу необходимые процедуры{/d} для извлечения данных. Вы можете проявить содействие в предоставлении доступа к реминисцентным блокам, однако для распечатывания блоков с потерянным доступом нам потребуется... несколько больше усилий".

traits.locale_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will carry out the necessary procedures to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

"...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will carry out the necessary procedures to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

"...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will carry out the necessary procedures to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

"...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

languages.text: “……审判庭对你的知识非常感兴趣。在决定你最终的命运之前，我会{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}执行必要的程序{/d}，从你身上提取信息。你可以协助我进入你的记忆区块。不过，若是要打开那些无法进入的区块，恐怕需要……更强的力量。”
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: “……审判庭对你的知识非常感兴趣。在决定你最终的命运之前，我会执行必要的程序，从你身上提取信息。你可以协助我进入你的记忆区块。不过，若是要打开那些无法进入的区块，恐怕需要……更强的力量。”

languages.text: «... Su conocimiento es especialmente interesante para la Inquisición. Antes de decidir su futuro, {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}realizaré los procedimientos necesarios{/d} para extraerle la información. Puede asistirme concediendo acceso a sus bloques reminiscentes, porque abrir los inaccesibles requerirá... más fuerza».
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: «... Su conocimiento es especialmente interesante para la Inquisición. Antes de decidir su futuro, realizaré los procedimientos necesarios para extraerle la información. Puede asistirme concediendo acceso a sus bloques reminiscentes, porque abrir los inaccesibles requerirá... más fuerza».

languages.text: 「…あなたの知識は異端審問庁にとって特に魅力的なものです。その運命が決定される前に、我は情報を引き出すために{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}必要な手順を実行{/d}します。あなたは自分の回想ブロックへのアクセスを提供すると言う形で我を支援することができますが、アクセスできないブロックの封印を解くには…より大きな力が必要となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: 「…あなたの知識は異端審問庁にとって特に魅力的なものです。その運命が決定される前に、我は情報を引き出すために{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}必要な手順を実行{/d}します。あなたは自分の回想ブロックへのアクセスを提供すると言う形で我を支援することができますが、アクセスできないブロックの封印を解くには…より大きな力が必要となるでしょう」

languages.text: « Vos connaissances sont particulièrement importantes pour l'Inquisition. Avant que nous ne décidions de votre sort, je {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}mènerai les procédures nécessaires{/d} pour extraire ces informations. Vous pouvez m'y aider en me donnant accès à vos blocs mémoriels. Cependant, desceller le bloc inaccessible nécessitera... davantage de force. »
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: « Vos connaissances sont particulièrement importantes pour l'Inquisition. Avant que nous ne décidions de votre sort, je mènerai les procédures nécessaires pour extraire ces informations. Vous pouvez m'y aider en me donnant accès à vos blocs mémoriels. Cependant, desceller le bloc inaccessible nécessitera... davantage de force. »

languages.text: "Euer Wissen ist für die Inquisition von besonderem Interesse. Bevor über Euer Schicksal entschieden wird, {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}werde ich die erforderlichen Prozeduren durchführen{/d}, um diese Informationen aus Euch zu extrahieren. Ihr könnt mithelfen, indem Ihr den Zugriff auf Eure Erinnerungsblöcke selbst gewährt, denn das Öffnen des unzugänglichen Blocks wäre ... ein größerer Gewaltakt."
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Wissen ist für die Inquisition von besonderem Interesse. Bevor über Euer Schicksal entschieden wird, werde ich die erforderlichen Prozeduren durchführen, um diese Informationen aus Euch zu extrahieren. Ihr könnt mithelfen, indem Ihr den Zugriff auf Eure Erinnerungsblöcke selbst gewährt, denn das Öffnen des unzugänglichen Blocks wäre ... ein größerer Gewaltakt."

languages.text: "Sahip olduğun bilgiler, Engizisyon'un özel ilgisini çekmekte. Sana ne olacağına karar vermeden önce sahip olduğun bilgileri ayıklamak için {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}gerekli prosedürleri işleteceğim{/d}. Anı bloklarına erişim sağlayarak yardımcı olabilirsin. Erişim dâhilinde olmayan bloku açmaksa... Güç kullanmayı gerektirecek."
languages.original_text: "...your knowledge is of particular interest to the Inquisition. Before your fate is decided, I will {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}carry out the necessary procedures{/d} to extract the information from you. You can assist by providing access to your reminiscence blocks, however, unsealing the inaccessible block will require... greater force."

traits.locale_text: "Sahip olduğun bilgiler Engizisyon'un özel ilgisini çekmekte. Sana ne olacağına karar vermeden önce, sahip olduğun bilgileri ayıklamak için {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}gereken prosedürleri işleteceğim{/d}. Anı bloklarına erişim sağlayarak yardımcı olabilirsin ancak erişim dâhilinde olmayan bloku açmak... Güç kullanmayı gerektirecek."
